page.title: 16 Employment in Wellow
page.content: West Wellow was originally a farming community,but recently has developed into a commuting population.Most people work in Southampton,Winchester, Eastleigh or Romsey travelling there by car as there are no efficient bus services.We found few manual workers, many office workers,mostly employed by local Government. Apart from rural industries(farms and nurseries)West Wellow contains many small businesses,mainly building and engineering firms.These rarely employ more than two people,often local part- time workers.Few full-time workers live in Wellow.The main employer was Wrenway Engineering,which employs fourteen men of varied ages,most of whom are skilled workers.Only two of these men live locally.This firm re-builds and makes tobacco machines for export. W.Shaw,P.Vokes,S.Parsons,S.Robinson,etc
